org.gvsig.app.project.documents.layout.fframes

Class FFrameText

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.app.project.documents.layout.fframes.FFrame
      • org.gvsig.app.project.documents.layout.fframes.FFrameText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, IFFrame, IPrintable, Disposable, Observable, Persistent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapSheetsFrameText

    public class FFrameText
extends FFrame
    FFrame para introducir un texto en el Layout.
